name: Cardrista
description:
Pretend to be a barista, like you have always wanted!

In this card themed barista simulator, you can grind coffee beans, drip brew, steam milk, and much more in your first 10 minute shift! Can you stay organized and keep up to serve the orders that seem to never stop?

Try to beat your order count each shift, or just relax and enjoy the atmosphere :)

Play full screen for a more immersive gaming experience!
